overview:
Camp de Bases is a marketing services agency specialized in relational marketing strategy optimization.

To support our customers, we implement a four axis approach:

  1. Strategies and cross-channel data optimization : diagnosis, best practices and change management,…
  2. Tools optimization: unique marketing database creation, data quality,…
  3. Customer knowledge optimization: data sourcing, reporting, targeting, data mining,…
  4. Cross-channel campaign optimization: test & learn, …

Camp de Bases provides consulting, technical support and technical solutions conceived by and for marketers: • Data Quality Flow: data processing solution to deliver a clean and usable marketing data base, • The conception of a unique marketing database, • Quintessence: a SaaS data management solution conceived by and for Marketing departments.
